name: James Moore
occupation: United Nations military engineer or sales
description: OK. I’m gonna try this one more time. First know my life is always in chaos. I don’t create it it just always is. What I would want the most is a quite life and someone to share it with. When I commit to a relationship it’s 110% I just want that one person to love, to share every aspect of my life with. To be not just a lover but a best friend. I’m very affectionate and love to spend time just cuddling. Being in someone’s arms and just enjoying the closeness.
